info.title: ClickSend API
info.description: Shared Public API for use in API Docs and examples for users.

tags.name: Account
tags.description: Endpoints associated with creating and managing user accounts.

tags.name: Contacts and Lists
tags.description: Endpoints for creating and modifying lists and populating them with contact information.

tags.name: Automations
tags.description: Endpoints for creating and manipulating time based and contact list automations and setting up the actions that will be triggered.

tags.name: SMS Templates
tags.description: Endpoints for creating, modifying and retrieving SMS templates.

post.description: Adds another contact to list since sometimes when automatically running tests export doesnt find the first one.

schema.example:
"{
        "phone_number": "3724763278",
        "first_name": "test",
        "last_name": "test",
        "custom_1": "t",
        "custom_2": "e",
        "custom_3": "s",
        "custom_4": "t",
        "date_added": null,
        "fax_number": null,
        "organization_name": null,
        "email": null,
        "address_line_1": "x",
        "address_line_2": null,
        "address_city": null,
        "address_state": null,
        "address_postal_code": null,
        "address_country": "AU"
}"

get.description: Get all contact details for a specified list

schema.example:
"{
        "phone_number": "07804645575",
        "first_name": "test",
        "last_name": "",
        "custom_1": "r",
        "custom_2": "",
        "custom_3": "",
        "custom_4": "",
        "date_added": null,
        "fax_number": null,
        "organization_name": null,
        "email": null,
        "address_line_1": null,
        "address_line_2": null,
        "address_city": null,
        "address_state": null,
        "address_postal_code": null,
        "address_country": null
}"

get.description: Get all opted-out lists for current authorised user

post.description: Duplicates template corresponding to given templateId

schema.example:
"{ "name": "test campaign", "subject": "Test email subject", "from_email_address_id": "{{emailId}}", "template_id": "{{templateId}}", "list_id": "{{listId}}", "from_name": "Test Name", "draft": 0, "schedule": "1250165515", "custom_string": "test !@#$%^&*()", "body": "

it's a test

" }"

"{ "name": "test campaign", "subject": "Test email subject", "from_email_address_id": "{{emailId}}", "template_id": "{{templateId}}", "list_id": "{{listId}}", "from_name": "Test Name", "draft": 0, "custom_string": "test !@#$%^&*()", "body": "

it's a test

" }"

"{
  "list_id": "{{listId}}",
  "name": "My Campaign",
  "from": "+6141111111",
  "body": "Hey (First Name), I want to ask if this is your lastname: (Last Name)? Visit http://smsg.io/xxxxx for more details.",
  "url_to_shorten": "http://www.google.com/",
  "subject": "New sms campaign test"
}"

"{
  "list_id": {{listId}},
  "name": "Koala Campaign",
  "from": "+61411111111",
  "body": "Hey (First Name), I want to ask if this is your lastname: (Last Name)? Also, do you like koalas? Visit http://smsg.io/xxxxx for more details.",
  "url_to_shorten": "http://test.com.au",
  "subject": "New MMS campaign test",
  "media_file": "https://www.ivertech.com/Articles/Images/KoalaBear200x200.jpg"
}"

post.description: Get price for MMS campaign send (multiple MMS sends)

schema.example:
"{
  "list_id": {{listId}},
  "name": "Koala Campaign",
  "from": "+61411111111",
  "body": "Hey (First Name), I want to ask if this is your lastname: (Last Name)? Also, do you like koalas? Visit http://smsg.io/xxxxx for more details.",
  "url_to_shorten": "http://test.com.au",
  "subject": "New MMS campaign test",
  "media_file": "https://www.ivertech.com/Articles/Images/KoalaBear200x200.jpg",
  "schedule": 1577833200
}"

get.description: Download a specified SDK file ( cs, java, android, objectivec, angular, ruby, python, php, nodejs, go )
